classHasDataItem: MATCH (s:product_class {guid:{src}}),(d:data_item {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:has]->(d) RETURN r as rid
classHasEvents: MATCH (s:product_class {guid:{src}}),(d:events {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:has]->(d) RETURN r as rid
classHasAggDataItem: MATCH (s:product_class {guid:{src}}),(d:data_item {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:has{avg:{avg}}]->(d) RETURN r as rid
createLink: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}}),(d:DEST_LBL {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:REL]->(d) RETURN r as rid
